name: Redman - The Machine Virus
description:
At the beginning of this history, Rex was walking through the avenue to go to home, but an incident made him get hurt by plasma shots, leaving its body almost burn. When he was in the hospital, a famous scientific appeared in the room where Rex was, and he decided to take him to his lab, and so, he was going to heal to Rex. That wasn't the only thing he was going to do to him...

Controls:

Move using the directional pad. Go through doors in [Up] arrow, Jump in [Z], Shot and Charged Shot in [X], Dash and Air-dash in [C], Skip dialogs in [Enter], Close the game in [Esc].
